hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "For every prophet there is one (special invocation (that will not be rejected) with which he appeals (to Allah), and I want to keep such an invocation for interceding for my followers in the Hereafter

chapter.eng-name: For every Prophet (ﷺ) there is one invocation surely granted
